Descriptions.Description: Part of LG's ground-breaking G series, the LG G3 combines premium features with extraordinary style. Its 13-megapixel camera with laser auto focus lets you record life in picture-perfect HD. Then, play it back on the beautiful 5.5-inch Quad HD screen. The LG G3 really is proof that seeing is believing. Fast, customizable, smooth. Enjoy the speed and simplicity of the powerful Android 5.0 (Lollipop) operating system. Everything's better on the big screen - and this beautiful 5.5" Quad HD IPS screen delivers. Experience the Web, apps and pictures like never before on a screen that supports four times the resolution of HD and an astonishing 538 pixels per inch. Capture crystal-clear photos and videos with the 13MP rear-facing camera, which features laser auto focus and OIS+ for incredibly quick focusing between shots. The 2MP front-facing camera is perfect for selfies. Get up to 24 hours of talk time from this long-lasting 3000 mAh lithium polymer battery. The fast Qualcomm Snapdragon 801 2.5 GHz quad-core processor allows for jaw-dropping graphics and lightning-quick switching between apps. Utilize the 32GB ROM/3GB RAM Memory to load all those essential apps. LG's solution to mobile security, "Knock Code" wakes up and unlocks your phone in one step using a tapping pattern from the dormant screen. Switch seamlessly between Sprint's nationwide 3G and 4G LTE networks and the all-new Enhanced LTE network, where available.

A 4.7-inch Retina HD display with 3D Touch. 7000 series aluminum and stronger cover glass. An A9 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture. All new 12MP iSight camera with Live Photos. Touch ID. Faster LTE and Wi-Fi. Long battery life. And iOS 9 and iCloud. All in a smooth, continuous unibody design.

Tackle your daily routine with the ALCATEL ONETOUCH Conquest. Certified water and dust resistant, this rugged Android phone is designed to withstand the toughest conditions. With a 5-inch, scratch-resistant HD screen and dual cameras, it's a feature-rich smartphone that's tough enough for real life. Touch, tap and swipe with purpose on this big, durable 5" HD IPS Display with Dragontrail Glass display. Damage-resistant Dragontrail glass lets you play rough without worrying about scratching your screen. Enjoy the speed and simplicity of the powerful Android 5.0 (Lollipop) operating system. Get up to 16 hours of talk time from this long-lasting 2500mAh lithium-ion battery. Certified waterproof for IPx5 and IPx7. It's protected up to 30 minutes in 1 meter of water. Score a win with a 5MP and front-facing cameras. Share your celebration with the front-facing camera. Keep your favorite music, videos and important files at your fingertips. Slip in an optional microSD card to add up to 32GB of extra storage. Get 8GB ROM/1GB RAM onboard memory to load all those essential apps. Switch seamlessly between Sprint's nationwide 3G and 4G LTE networks and the all-new Enhanced LTE network, where available.

This smartphone gives you maximum screen size for a superior experience. The Boost MAX boasts a 5.7-inch HD IPS Display with Corning Gorilla Glass. Everything's better on the big screen - and this durable, HD screen delivers. Experience the Web, apps and pictures like never before. Enjoy Dolby Digital Plus sound and expect a more realistic, immersive experience. Movies and videos come to life with a powerful, virtual surround sound experience. The 8 MP rear-facing camera with 1 MP front-facing camera allow you to capture vivid detail in almost any situation with sharp photos. The front-facing camera features 720p HD capabilities. The Boost MAX also utilizes 4G LTE and Android 5.1. Take your mobile phone experience to the MAX.

Small and powerful, the Lumia 635 is everything you need right in the palm of your hand. Equipped with Windows Phone 8.1, a highly advanced quad-core processor and the Windows personal voice assistant, Cortana, this phone lets you do it all. Enjoy the Windows 8.1 with features such as the ability to personalize your start screen and gain access all your chats, social updates and settings from the new Action Center. Discover pictures, apps and videos like you've never seen before with this generously-sized screen. Snap pictures of all the best moments in your life with the 5MP rear facing camera featuring auto focus. Plus, capture yourself with Lumia Selfie, the exclusive self-portrait app. Do more of things you love. The Qualcomm Snapdragon™ processor gives you blazing fast speeds for a superior experience. Talk, text and play longer with the powerful 1830mAH removable battery. The days of jotting down items on your to-do list are over. Cortana helps you by reminding you to complete certain tasks and warns you of inclement weather. Plus, she will also learn about your specific interests in order to make recommendations that are tailored just for you. Switch seamlessly between Sprint's nationwide 3G and 4G LTE networks and the all-new Enhanced LTE network, where available.

A show-stopping device built with definite curve appeal. Beneath its stunning curved display, the LG G Flex2 boasts an advanced 13MP camera with laser auto-focus for incredibly lifelike pictures and videos. That's in addition to a 2.0GHz octa-core processor that delivers high-speed browsing and effortless multitasking. The G Flex2 is seriously powerful and simply unique. Fast, customizable, smooth. Enjoy the speed and simplicity of the powerful Android 5.1 (Lollipop) operating system. A curved design makes using the big 5.5" full HD curved P-OLED vibrant screen feel natural and intuitive. Experience the Web, apps and pictures like never before. Capture crystal-clear photos and videos with the 13MP OIS+ rear-facing camera featuring lightning-fast laser auto-focus. The 2.1MP front-facing camera is perfect for selfies. Get up to 23 hours of talk time from this long-lasting 3000 mAh lithium polymer battery. With eight separate cores, this 2.0GHz Octa-Core Qualcomm Snapdragon processor lets you enjoy jaw-dropping graphics, powerful multitasking and lightning-quick switching between apps. Utilize the 32GB ROM/2GB RAM Memory to load all those essential apps. Keep your favorite music, videos and important files at your fingertips. Slip in an optional microSD card to add up to 2TB of extra storage with a microSDXC card (sold separately). Switch seamlessly between Sprint's nationwide 3G and 4G LTE networks and the all-new Enhanced LTE network, where available.

Share your world, not your wallet. This sleek, Android-powered device has all the functionality you want, minus the steep price tag. Get Android 4.4 (KitKat), quad-core power and LTE speed on the Samsung Galaxy Prevail LTE. Plus, with two cameras and 8GB of built-in storage, it's easy to share your world. Enjoy your photos, videos and apps on a 4.5" screen that's big enough to share and still compact enough to pocket easily. Do more of the things you love. The fast 1.2 GHz quad-core processor Qualcomm Snapdragon 410 processor delivers the jaw-dropping graphics you love. Enjoy many hours of talk time with the 2000mAh battery. Use the 8GB ROM/1GB RAM to keep your favorite music, videos and important files at your fingertips, and slip in an optional microSD card to add up to 128GB of extra storage. Experience crystal-clear call quality with reduced background noise while calling another HD Voice-enabled phone on the Sprint network. Switch seamlessly between Sprint's nationwide 3G and 4G LTE networks and the all-new Enhanced LTE network, where available.

Meet the reimagined Samsung Galaxy S 6. Featuring an incredibly fast octa-core processor, Android 5.1 and a 5.1" super AMOLED display, the Galaxy S 6 has it all. Its innovative dual-edge display features stunning metal and sophisticated glass - so it's got toughness as well as good looks. The Samsung Exynos 7420 Octa-Core 64-bit processor allows for jaw-dropping graphics and lightning-quick switching between apps. Enjoy bright images and full HD video on the go with this crisp 5.1" Quad HD Super AMOLED screen and rich color display. Capture crystal-clear photos and videos every time with the 16MP rear-facing and 5MP front-facing cameras with auto real-time HDR. Enjoy the speed and simplicity of the powerful Android 5.1 (Lollipop) operating system. Get up to 23 hours of talk time from the 2550 mAh long-lasting lithium-ion battery. Charge wirelessly with an optional wireless charging pad (sold separately). Keep your favorite music, videos and important files at your fingertips with 32GB of onboard memory. Switch seamlessly between Sprint's nationwide 3G and 4G LTE networks and the all-new Enhanced LTE network, where available.

The Next Big Thing Is Here, The Samsung Galaxy S 5, and the features are out of this world. Smart and stylish, inside and out. Moto G is designed for all the things you want to do - taking and sharing photos, watching videos, checking scores, getting directions, listening to music, you name it. Every detail is just how you'd like it. Plus, get an extra 50GB of Google Drive storage for two years! Enjoy the most-loved features of Android - sleek simplicity and speed - along with new features such as Bluetooth Smart technology. You'll also score a guaranteed upgrade to Android 4.4, KitKat. Experience videos, apps, and pictures like never before with the 4.5-inch HD 720 Corning Gorilla Glass display. This sizable screen is sharp, stunning and scratch-resistant. Touch anywhere to snap the perfect picture, capture panoramic pictures with the 5 megapixel camera. Take all the selfies you want with the 1.3 megapixel front-facing camera and shoot your own high-definition videos. Do more of the things you love. The Qualcomm Snapdragon 400 1.2GHz quad core processor gives you breathtaking speed, jaw-dropping graphics and long battery life so you can browse, stream and download in a flash. Talk, text and play longer with the longer lasting battery. Enjoy 24 hours of use with the built-in rechargeable lithium-ion, 2070 mAh battery. Get an added layer of protection. Moto G features liquid repellent nano-coating technology, which prevents water from being absorbed onto the phone's surfaces. Connect to your local Wi-Fi network for even faster speeds and find where you need to go around town or across the country with GPS access. Take advantage of Bluetooth 4.0 capabilities with the ability to listen to music and answer calls wirelessly, in stereo, when you pair your Moto G with a Bluetooth headset (sold separately).

Slim, stylish and affordable, this basic feature phone boasts a full, slide-out QWERTY keyboard meaning texting and social media are always at your fingertips.
